pages.text: The Athame is an essential tool to any witch. It can be used to gather heads from mobs, among other niche uses.$(br2)Being made out of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)Silver$(), it is perfectly usable against unholy creatures.$(br2)Bottles of Blood can be obtained by slaying a humanoid with an Athame while holding a Glass Bottle in the offhand.
Athames can also be used to start $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Rituals$() from a Dispenser.
